name: light path
description:
This is a casual racing game. You drove a big truck to a coastal city and had a car race in the city. Do you want to take a car and run in the city? This game can satisfy you. The game is easy to operate and uses directional keys to control the movement of large trucks. There are many roads under construction and waiting for traffic lights. See if you can finish the entire journey! Follow traffic rules on the roads in the city! Reminder: Do not collide with large trucks and pedestrians. Roads marked in yellow are prohibited roads

Game features:

Unrestrained driving experience for vehicles
